name: Isabeau D’Argyll
info:
• 简体中文名: 伊莎波
  • 别名: Izzy
  • 别名: 伊格赖因
  • 别名: Lady Igraine
  • 性别: 女
detail: Isabeau D'Argyll, also known as Lady Igraine, or by her nickname Isi, is a member of the Knights of the Round Table. She is the adopted daughter of the Lord Chancellor, a younger stepsister to Alastair, and the hinted love interest of Grayson. However, her pledge in the fourteenth chapter may suggest her as an eventual antagonist in a future installment.
